channel.title: Someone help me on npc dialogs! I can't figure this out!

item.title: Someone help me on npc dialogs! I can't figure this out!
item.dc:creator: @b3nj4m1n_8 b3nj4m1n_8
item.description:
@b3nj4m1n_8 wrote:

just delte what they say now and put when u want them to say

example-

case 1339:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Welcome to ZombieScape, " +playerName+”", 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1340:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“just erase the already typed words and replace”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1341:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(playerName, 4884);
sendFrame126(“are you cool?”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“hell no im a geek”, 4886);
sendFrame75(pCHead, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;

Read full topic
item.source: Someone help me on npc dialogs! I can't figure this out!

item.title: Someone help me on npc dialogs! I can't figure this out!
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 1339:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Welcome to ZombieScape, " +playerName+”", 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1340:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
sendFrame126(“You need to register at www.zombiescape.tk”, 4885);
sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;
case 1341:
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(playerName, 4884);
sendFrame126(“Nah, I’ll do it later”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue”, 4886);
sendFrame75(pCHead, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;

break;

I have this added and the Npc dialog thing +1 something like that, but my npc will only say 1339 and 13340 , he want say 1341 ! I don’t know what to do and I even asked the expert on it :l (delta)
